title: GoToMeeting
creator: Citrix Online, a division of Citrix Systems, Inc

extendedInfo.description: Increase your mobility by starting and attending GoToMeetingÂ® sessions on your Androidâ¢ device. GoToMeeting is the easiest and most convenient online meeting solution. Download the free app and join or start meetings in seconds.Anywhere you take your Android device, you can now attend and start GoToMeeting sessions â at a cafÃ©, in a hotel, wherever you happen to be.*** GoToTraining not currently supported at this time.FEATURES â¢ NEW: See all upcoming meetings and join with a single tap.â¢ Attend GoToMeeting and GoToWebinar sessions wherever you are. â¢ Start your scheduled meetings.â¢ Hand-off presentation control to anyone else in the meeting.â¢ Dial into a phone conference with one tap.â¢ Chat with other meeting attendees or everyone in the meeting.â¢ View presentations, mockups and reports â whatever is shown on screen.â¢ Connect to audio through your deviceâs built-in mic & speakers.â¢ Use Q&A, answer poll questions and raise your hand in GoToWebinar sessions.HOW TO JOIN A MEETINGYou donât need to purchase an account to attend GoToMeeting sessions. After you download the free GoToMeeting app, there are several easy ways to join a meeting: â¢ Tap a link in an invitation email and then follow the prompts.â¢ Tap the GoToMeeting app icon and select the meeting you want to join or enter a meeting ID.â¨â¨Tap the GoToMeeting daisy icon on your Android device and enter the Meeting ID provided by the meeting organizer.For the best audio experience, please use a headset when connected via "Mic & Headphones" (VoIP).HOW TO HOST A MEETINGYouâll need a GoToMeeting account to host meetings from your Android device.â¢ If you donât have a GoToMeeting account already, start by signing up for a free 30-day trial at http://www.gotomeeting.com.â¢ Tap the GoToMeeting app on your Android device and log in to your account.â¢ Start a new meeting by tapping âMeet Nowâ or click on a prescheduled meeting. You may make any attendee an organizer so that they can show their computer screen.REQUIREMENTSâ¢ Android 2.2 or higher.â¢ We recommend devices with a 1 Ghz processor or higher.

reviews.title: GREAT OPPORTUNITY
reviews.comment: Great way to have accessible cost-effective QUALITY webinars!
reviews.author: Jennifer Jenson

reviews.title: Good app, but fixes needed
reviews.comment: But still does need improvements ..like adjust on low bandwidth.does not allow user to login if so pop closes or connection breaks.Will give 5 I\'d these solved
reviews.author: Sarika L

reviews.title: Error Message
reviews.comment: I continue to receive an error about not being supported on my device (Samsung Galaxy III).
reviews.author: Stephana Bledsoe

reviews.title: GTM app doesn\'t work with all GTMs
reviews.comment: I have been invited to many GoToMeeting appointments (and yes, they definitely say GTM and not competitors like Webex), but many of them don\'t run on the app because the app advises the meeting was scheduled thru a 3rd party. Why doesn\'t the GTM app work with every GTM event?
reviews.author: Susyn Stecchi

reviews.title: More effective than face to face
reviews.comment: Our Board consists of members across Texas. We have successfully conducted important meetings with members on the phone and web, at times times convenient to all. Saves time and travel costs. All can follow the same documents and committee chairs can take over the screen for their reports. Excellent!
reviews.author: Donna Harp

reviews.title: Problem code 2
reviews.comment: Continuously getting audio saying \"Problem code 2\".Please give proper error message.
reviews.author: sandeep manne

reviews.title: One click join!
reviews.comment: Very convenient join feature.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work. HTC 1
reviews.comment: The site keeps cycling from start page back to the start page where you have to fill in your information again.
reviews.author: mark parker

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: wasim javed

reviews.title: No Live Video
reviews.comment: This app is no substitute for the PC or Mac app.  If all one does is to listen and see slides, it\'s probably fine.  But if, like me, one attends live online classes which use live video, then this app falls short, though its iOS version does.
reviews.author: Evandro Menezes

reviews.comment: Calendar integration and single tap join. Brilliant idea!
reviews.author: AJ ForAds

reviews.comment: Cool
reviews.author: Subhendu Swain

reviews.title: See my calendar?
reviews.comment: I don\'t want to give you access to my calendar!
reviews.author: Jonathan Nation

reviews.title: Great program but sometimes there is a sound issue on the webinar.
reviews.comment: Easy to use for novices on the web.
reviews.author: Marlene Mankin

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Love the new version!
reviews.author: Te Li

reviews.title: not stable in andriod
reviews.comment: i am using sumsung note2, but gotometting quite unexpected very often, this issue isnt happen on desktop and ios version.
reviews.author: Lincoln Young

reviews.title: Very Convenient
reviews.comment: Use this app @ work; now on the road as well! Great app; easy to use; convenient; and the only variance is the connection speed, depending on the signal strength over the airways.
reviews.author: Sam Wood

reviews.title: Works well on my Sam gla s 3
reviews.comment: Not sure that the problem is with most other reviews..  I can create a meeting.  Talk via voip in it and watch the scree.  It would be great if I could also remote control the other user,  but I\'m sure that is coming soon
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ...plus confidential information.
reviews.comment: You go too far Citrix, asking for permission to \"read calendar events and confidential information.\" This update will not be applied.
reviews.author: Chad Walstrom

reviews.title: It worked once for me. Not since.
reviews.comment: Each upgrade gets better. It will be very useful once it supports bluetooth. It\'s 2012 and everyone who has meetings has bluetooth. Mobile app means it will be used while on the move. How can a user use it on the move for a 1 hour meeting if it does not support bluetooth?
reviews.author: A Google User
